thread.section_title: Living: Weddings, Interior Design, Food, Travel, and Parties - Vogue
thread.title: Kelly Wearstler’s Most Inspirational Travel Destinations Around the World
thread.title_full: Kelly Wearstler’s Most Inspirational Travel Destinations Around the World - Vogue

author: Brooke Bobb
title: Kelly Wearstler’s Most Inspirational Travel Destinations Around the World
text:
“I really love traveling anywhere and everywhere,” designer Kelly Wearstler told Vogue last year . “It’s all about educating my eye and experiencing new environments, cultures, and architecture.” And it’s abundantly clear from her Instagram as well, where she regularly posts colorful photos of the elaborately decorated spaces and geometric-inspired details that she encounters on her far-flung excursions. These bold landscapes clearly inform Wearstler’s own decor, like the use of Bofill-esque pink and blue for her Head Trip sculptures . And while Wearstler’s references may be varied, there are five specific destinations that never lose their place on her ever-changing mood boards. Below, the designer shares her most cherished sources of creativity and the objects they inspired.
Vogue may earn compensation on these sales through affiliate programs.
